skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.actions.EnhanceProduction
skill.description: For an agent to enact the action of improving the resource node capabiltiy of production. Once the action is complete, the resource node production will be definitely incresed with the specified quantity of resource.

parameter.name: resourceNode
parameter.description: The resource node to act on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resource that will be added to the node capability of production.

feedback.name: enhanceProductionActionCompleted
feedback.description: Sent once simulation action is complete (production capability of the node is definitely increased with the specified quantity).
